thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com
thread.title: Jody Helme-day
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Jody Helme-day

author: Jody Helme-day
title: Jody Helme-day
text: Our salespeople were extremely helpful, gave us room to look around and make a decision, and explained everything perfectly. Delivery was right on time. I wish Gardner White sold appliances, for our search for a stove has been a nightmare in comparison!
